**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 131 1.1 **Price** 15,000 gp **Usage** held in 1 hand **Bulk** 1 --- Clock faces and gears adorn the twisted iron shaft of a _chronomancer staff_, the hands of the clocks continually ticking or winding backward. Used as a weapon, the staff is a _+2 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [speed](/Equipment.aspx?ID=304) [staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=12)_. While wielding this staff, you also gain a +1 circumstance bonus to initiative rolls.
  • **Cantrip** [_time sense_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1193)
  • **1st** [_déjà vu_](/Spells.aspx?ID=684), [_synchronize_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1013)
  • **2nd** [_loose time's arrow_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1185), _synchronize_
  • **3rd** [_day's weight_](/Spells.aspx?ID=891), [_haste_](/Spells.aspx?ID=147), [_slow_](/Spells.aspx?ID=289), [_time jump_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1019)
  • **4th** [_curse of lost time_](/Spells.aspx?ID=683)
  • **5th** [_quicken time_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1187), [_rewinding step_](/Spells.aspx?ID=985), [_stagnate time_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1188)
  • **6th** [_cast into time_](/Spells.aspx?ID=880), _day's weight_
  • **7th** [_time beacon_](/Spells.aspx?ID=592)
**Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.
name: Chronomancer Staff
